column2: Let's make a really cool enemy in Lightspeed!
OK, first let's spawn the enemy I have in mind in level 8. I call it.. the BEAM. Let's go to the code.
Select the Beam. Do you see it? Isn't it cool? Let's spawn it in this level.
And go test it in the level.
Let's see if it shows up...
Nope. I don't see it. Where did it go? Let's try it again.
Press flip to hack and let's get back to the code.
Haha... Nice! Next we should make it more intelligent. Come get me whenever you want to try that.
